name: Daftari
short_description:
Daftari is a simplistic static multilingual online webpage editor.

What does this mean?
Simplistic means: It has only primitive edit features.
Static means: It saves directly to HTML, not to a database.
Multilingual means : You can edit multiple languages in one dialog.
Online means : You edit the pages directly in your browser.

How does it work?
Select 'Switch edit mode on' in the Daftari's menu. Then the
page will be equip with icons to edit one element at a time.
After confirming your edit, you immediately see the result.

The limitation so far is, that saving the edited page to
the server works only on localhost, not yet on a public page.
summary: Simplistic static multilingual online webpage editor
